comment_text: I wish you’d make a video on one of your channels about how you first became involved in Peru. My wife does medical mission trips to Guatemala. She’s a nurse and I own a flooring company. I have degrees in business and I’ve studied engineering at Embry Riddle. I guess my question is, what are the logistics of building an orphanage? It seems like a monumental task but we all have to start somewhere, some of us just don’t know where to start.
Cool channel! I love contemplating nature, discover and relax...
IT'S A WATERFALL FOR CRYING OUT LOUD!   I laughed so hard! After you posted your 100th video, I went back and found this gem =D
Wow.... it must have been so beautiful to actually see it! :)
